alert.note: Alert for Briscoe; Hall; Motley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 8:48PM CDT until August 04 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Motley County in northwestern Texas... Southwestern Hall County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Briscoe County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 847 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Flomot, or 7 miles south of Turkey, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Matador, Flomot and Roaring Springs. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
